  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94322</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Etoiles et  planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Stars and planets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterne und Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrelas e planetas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stelle e pianeti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστέρια και πλανήτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrellas y planetas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que nous pouvons voir  des étoiles, comme Sirius et le soleil, parce qu'elles envoient de la  lumière. Nous pouvons voir des planètes parce qu'elles réfléchissent la lumière du soleil.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that we can see stars, such as Sirius and the Sun, because they send out light. We can see planets because they reflect light from the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Mars</string>
            <string language="en">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Sirius</string>
            <string language="en">Sirius</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ciel</string>
            <string language="en">sky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß wir Sterne, wie 
Sirius und die Sonne sehen können, weil sie Licht aussenden. 
Wir können Planeten sehen, weil sie Licht von der Sonne 
reflektieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que nós podemos ver 
estrelas, tais como Sirius e o sol, porque emitem para fora a luz. 
Nós podemos ver planetas porque refletem a luz do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che possiamo vedere 
le stelle, quali Sirius ed il sole, perché spediscono la luce. 
Possiamo vedere i pianeti perché riflettono la luce dal sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μπορούμε να 
δούμε τα αστέρια, όπως Sirius και ο ήλιος, επειδή 
στέλνουν το φως. Μπορούμε να δούμε τους πλανήτες 
επειδή απεικονίζουν το φως από τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que podemos ver las 
estrellas, tales como Sirius y el sol, porque envían la luz. 
Podemos ver los planetas porque reflejan la luz del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
